Very good job!

....That's how... we get away. The girl's smile falls ever so slightly. Then the boy suddenly... TAPS her on the shoulder and scurries away... She's "it". As the girl slowly gets up to follow him, we see for the first time... A HEARING AID... The boy disappears around a corner...

The girl comes around the tall shelf into the next aisle suddenly... her eyes go wide!!! What she sees is the boy standing on a small box, STRETCHING to reach a toy on a h shelf. She walks quickly to him when suddenly... the toy FALLS. The girl instinctively SLIDES to the ground and catches t toy JUST as it's about to hit the ground! On her face we see she is TERRIFIED! She closes her eyes, taking a breat with relief. When she opens them, in the foreground, we s the toy she is holding... a small TOY SPACE SHUTTLE. Then the distance past the toy we see... a FIGURE. She sits up to see a man standing outside the door of the general store, holding a large box with what looks like a quilt hanging out of it. The father gently puts the box on the ground and pulls ba the pieces of thick quilt to reveal that all the contents actually wrapped in it.

He then reaches for a LARGE HIKING BACK PACK, and begins transferring the contents of the box into the bag. As he does, we see... cans of food, a variety of prescription pills, bandages and wrapped syringes. The girl arrives at his side and excitedly starts rummagi through the box as well. From the box, she pulls out a SALVAGED SECURITY CAMERA with wi exposed. The girl gives it a brief once over and then removes... two exposed CIRCUIT BOARDS, very obviously onl recently removed from whatever appliance they belonged to The girl scans the boards with a voracity, pointing out t the father particular areas of interest. Her father can't help but smile. Suddenly, the box of Amoxicillin comes into frame and is placed on top... along with two boxes of sugar. The fathe looks up at his wife. After a beat... she signs:
For my tea. He just keeps looking at her.
Fine. I have a sweet tooth. The father smiles and is about to close the bag when... a candy bar is placed on top.
Me too! The father looks up at her with fake incredulity. Suddenl the sick son in his mother's arms weakly signs:

Me too. The whole family laughs silently as the daughter GENTLY t another candy bar from a box below the cash register... W can now see why the boxes are almost empty. The father looks back to his arriving four year old son, expecting the same, but from behind his back the young bo reveals... the toy space shuttle. With a sweet empathy the father reaches for the toy... an shakes his head no. He turns the toy over and silently explains it has batteries... this toy can make noise.

The little boy watches, confused... hurt, as his father gently places the space shuttle on the counter. And then gently grabs a big lollipop and puts it in the bag for th boy. The mother hands their sick son to the father who picks h up and walks out. The mother kisses her 4 year old on the head, shuffles the hiking bag onto her back and walks out too. The daughter looks at the boy as tears begin to fill his eyes. She smiles and signs:

It's ok. The boy shakes his head no. After a moment... the girl looks back to see if her paren are there. She then reaches up and takes the shuttle down from the counter. With wide eyes her little brother watch as she surgically removes the batteries... and places the shuttle in the hood of her brother's sweatshirt. Covering from view, she holds a finger up to her lips in the obligatory big sister way of telling him not to get her i trouble... He beams! She then stands up and places the batteries back on the counter, smiles at her brother and gestures "let's go".

The daughter exits the General Store and follows her moth and father, who are walking down the street only stepping the sand path. Their steps are almost silent. After a moment... her four year old brother follows behin her. We watch everyone walk in total silence. Then...
We slowly push in to the counter of the store and then realize... THE BATTERIES ARE GONE!
A long road slices its way through a heavily wooded area, which further blocks the already fading sun.

In WIDE PROFILE we see the family walking in a line, continuing only on a sand path. The father is in front carrying their sick son, then the mother with the backpac then their blonde daughter... and trailing a bit behind rumbles their robust 4 year old.

From the ground we look up at an old and rusted bridge towering over us eerily... the sand path continues across WE TRACK WITH THE FAMILY as they walk across the bridge.. There are minor creaks underneath the sand. Suddenly we see... the four year old stops just before th entrance of bridge. The family continues... not seeing hi WE FOLLOW THE BOY'S HANDS as he fishes around in his hood pulls out... THE TOY SHUTTLE. HEAD ON, we walk with the father, each member of his prou brood can be seen walking behind him. We can hear his strained breath... and the tiniest swish of the footsteps sand. We walk with her for a long moment, when suddenly behind her... A FLICKERING RED AND BLUE LIGHT. The girl does not turn. She just keeps walking. Still smiling. Still in BLACK... A new sound... Almost like that of the ocean.

The new sound continues. In the last of the day's sunligh WE TRACK, LOOKING STRAIGHT DOWN, on... what appears to be empty beach. The pink lit sand, now combined with a sound like the ocean, feels serene, almost otherworldly. Slowly coming into frame, we see the face of... the daugh This is REGAN ABBOTT. Her hair is much longer. She is now TWO YEARS OLDER, 12. She just looks... different. REGAN lays in the sand with eyes closed... but she is not asleep. With her brow furrowed and her closed eyes darting back a forth she looks oddly pained... almost as if she is wishi herself to another place. There is movement in her hands as her fingers caress an object. Her eyes suddenly POP OPEN as she sits up violently CLOSE INTO OUR FRAME! She looks around with eyes wet and red, attempting to regain her bearings. WE SLOWLY MOVE AROUND her to see what she sees and are me with... a jarringly incongruous landscape! Instead of a glistening ocean, there in front of REGAN stand the tall swaying stalks of... A CORNFIELD. As REGAN looks to her lap WE SLOWLY TRAVEL DOWN to reveal she is holding THE TOY SHUTTLE. As she maneuvers it throu her fingers we see the shuttle is damaged... there are 2 large gouges in the fuselage. Suddenly... Something startles her as she snaps her head the side! WE GO CLOSE on her hand driving the TOY SHUTTLE into the sand, not wanting it to be seen. Now ONLY THE SHUTTLE'S T is exposed in the foreground as we see a figure walking toward REGAN. Coming into focus is... her mother. This is EVELYN ABBOTT EVELYN too has changed. Hair longer... frame lower. She carries a basket of vegetables. She is bare foot. EVELYN stops and looks down at her daughter giving her a comforting smile. REGAN can't seem to return the same.

EVELYN gently gestures with her head. REGAN nods... and EVELYN walks on. After a moment... REGAN places the TOY SHUTTLE into the large pocket in her dress and follows he mother. As she goes: WE PAN TO FOLLOW REGAN as she joins her mother and then SLOWLY RISE to reveal that the two women are walking alon A LONG AND WIDE SAND PATH IN THE MIDDLE OF A FARM! In the distance we can see they are heading to... A WEATHERED RE BARN. WE END OUR RISE just as we reveal in the foreground... Christmas lights? Like parallel telephone wires, 2 cables large bulbs, one with red and one with white. They dance playfully in the wind.

CLOSE UP PROFILE of a steering wheel in the foreground. A weathered CHEVY emblem reflects the fire orange sky in th background. HANDS come into frame and gently grip the steering wheel. The right hand then slowly moves to the ignition block... turns. There is no sound. After a moment, the hand turns again...again without sound. The hand turns a third time. this time, the hand begins to bob ever so slightly... as the old car has started up. As the hand retracts: WE PULL BACK to reveal... The little brother. This is MAR ABBOTT, now 10. Moving ever so slightly, MARCUS is obviou pretending to drive... though his impassive face betrays idea that he is having any fun. MARCUS seems to have aged much more than the mere 2 years. His vacant eyes tell us large toll has been taken on him, though perhaps not as easily recognizable on the exterior.

WE MOVE SLOWLY IN POV along another large sand path with grass on either side when suddenly it opens up into a lar clearing and we see... a tractor?... Shells of untouched equipment litter the open area. WE SLOWLY MOVE LEFT, making our way through, what is now nothing more than an eery farming vehicle graveyard. Suddenly... A DARK FIGURE ENTERS THE FRAME.

MARCUS's hands move silently along the steering wheel as stares out the windshield. His body moves ever so slightl his face... relaxes... the hint of a smile. For a moment could almost believe he is driving. His eyes routinely ch the side mirror, then the rearview mirror... then stop. H hands... and face fall. THROUGH THE REAR VIEW MIRROR, we see a figure standing be the truck amidst the sea of farm equipment. Behind the fi we see... A TOWERING SILO.

OVER THE DARK FIGURE onto the truck as we see MARCUS expe slip out of the cab window of a VINTAGE CHEVY PICKUP that sits at the edge of a DESCENDING DRIVEWAY connecting to t road that heads back toward the BARN. He lands in the san without a sound and begins to walk, head held low, toward dark figure... who reaches his hand out and briefly touch Marcus' shoulder. Marcus walks straight past. As MARCUS exits we BOOM UP the dark figure as it turns, revealing... LEON ABBOTT (LEE), 38. LEE too has changed, though much more obviously. He has lost weight on his str farmer frame, he wears a beard and his sunken eyes indica that he hasn't slept well... in a long time. WE PULL BACK WIDE to reveal the sea of farm equipment sit front of a long, dilapidated, work shed roof... a makeshi repair shop. The word `REPAIR' is written in flaking whit paint that clings to the wood above.

The line of Christmas lights dance in the foreground. WE TILT DOWN to see that the lights run right in between. two towering doors of a weathered red BARN. The doors hav been left open by a gap of just over 2 feet. The edges of the doors... are wrapped in foam... Suddenly MARCUS walks into frame... and enters the barn.
WE TILT DOWN from the lines of unilluminated Christmas li running below the high reaching ceiling and...

ONTO MARCUS' BACK as he walks through two heavy quilts at entry of the barn hanging from the ceiling. Through the quilts, a dirt floor guides us through this... barn? The surroundings are too difficult to fully comprehend at fir glance. To the left are several large horse stalls. WE QUICKLY PA INSIDE to see they are now... bedrooms. Mattresses, perfectly made up, lie on the floor next to lamps and sma stacks of books. Clothes on hangers dangle between each o the bars providing not only storage, but limited privacy. To the right is a large pen with railings. Once a holding area for cows awaiting milking, it is now... a living roo Hay bales draped in blankets and old wooden chairs surrou an overturned pig trough, now serving as a coffee table covered in books and dripping candles. As MARCUS continues we notice the walls. Every inch is meticulously covered in a bizarre but elegant cornucopia of... trash. Foam, cardboard, and old newspapers are glue the wall in thick layers. If one were able to look past the obvious first assumptio a hovel or domicile of hoarders, they would see almost... deliberate beauty in the decor... A warmth. This is a wel maintained and loving... home. WE FOLLOW ON MARCUS' BACK as he suddenly comes to... A MATTRESS LAYING ON THE GROUND? MARCUS bends down and afte brief struggle pushes the mattress to one side to reveal. large hole... WE FOLLOW JUST BEHIND MARCUS... as he descends down the ground...

WE NOW SEE MARCUS has descended a makeshift stairwell int A small excavated room illuminated by work lights. Lodged against the walls and across the ceiling are wooden beams In between each beam are varying stages of an elaborate process of insulation and sound proofing that consists of thick layer of newspaper as a base and then blankets and pillows squeezed in on top. There is a hay bale up agains one wall and a mattress leaned up against another. In the middle of the room, MARCUS walks past... EVELYN, w is bent over behind an odd wooden box. Suddenly she stand up, holding a beautiful and delicate... baby mobile. As she turns and reaches the mobile high in the air to a above her we get a clear shot... of her protruding belly.

Even a layman guess would put her over 8 months. EVELYN gently taps the mobile as we: ARE NOW CLOSE ON the small ducks and clouds moving throug the air, EVELYN below looking up... with a smile. She removes a large sheet of newspaper from a plastic tra glue, lets it drip... and then applies it to the wall wit thick paintbrush. As she moves the paintbrush vertically the dripping white, a piece of an image can be seen... It a bra ad. REGAN slowly looks over to MARCUS... who stares it. BACK ON EVELYN as she removes the top of the odd wooden b WE FOLLOW her hands in to reveal... a heavily quilted ins with adorable baby blankets, a small teddy bear... and a clear plastic air mask?? EVELYN's fingers fumble with something in the corner unti she finally threads through... a thin plastic tube... and connects it to the air mask. It looks similar to an emergency breathing apparatus one might see in an ambulan or hospital... because it is. BACK ON MARCUS, as he now removes a large piece of drippi newspaper out of the tray and places it on the wall. Like sister, he swipes his thick paintbrush vertically down th dripping white, this time partially revealing a front pag headline. It reads...

MARCUS freezes... then looks below to see the top of a gr newspaper photograph. All we can make out is... a twisted human arm. His hand slowly begins to shake as he raises t paintbrush to reveal the rest of the image... when sudden
MARCUS JUMPS!!!!!... Only to see his mom holding a pillow over the newspaper with a knowing look. After a beat, she hands MARCUS a long piece of tape to secure the pillow to wall.

ON THE BACK OF... LEE, perched on what looks like the top the world. From this great height we get our first WIDE SHOT of the large farm that we now see sits in a clearing on a ridge. surrounded by the tangled forest of the APPALACHIAN MOUNTAINS. A puff of smoke rises from LEE's silhouette as he suddenl raises a hand into frame... and checks his watch. A momen later... As if on cue... A line of CHRISTMAS LIGHTS flicker to life above the wide sand path REGAN was laying on. Another line of white Christmas lights flicker on... this time revealing a path that connects the weathered red BAR to an old white FARMHOUSE. Then another line of lights... and another! Like the image of a city power grid coming b to life, we see a labyrinth of countless sand paths, meticulously laid out, illuminate all over the farm in a beautiful expanse. NOW IN PROFILE, LEE stares down... seemingly at nothing. unfiltered cigarette burns to his fingers, causing LEE to snap out of his stupor. He looks around at the horizon, i officially sundown. He reaches for a plastic bottle of... Lighter fluid... and sprays all its contents into a shall metal drum in front of him. Another cigarette appears from below frame. He puts it in mouth and then reaches his hands... into his jacket. His right arm jiggles slightly. There is no sound. His arm jiggles again. Then from his jacket, LEE pulls... a FULLY LIGHTER, that he protects from the wind. He lights his cigarette and then leans his hands to the metal drum... A HUGE FLAME ERUPTS. In the glowing orange we see LEE take a long drag of his cigarette. His face has no affect. After several moments flame begins to weaken and slowly fade. Suddenly, far FAR off in the distance on the ridge... ANO FLAME ILLUMINATES. LEE doesn't even look up. Then, miles past the first... ANOTHER FLAME!... THEN ANOTHER! Until w can see behind LEE 5 glowing fires scattered far off acro the ridge. ON LEE as he glances over and registers... then back to staring front as we:

MOVE AROUND BEHIND him to see where his gaze is focused. Then... we see it. There, in his left hand LEE holds... A nursery school photo of a 4 year old boy. LEE takes a last drag of his cigarette... and then places photo in a small box at his feet. WE ARE TIGHT ON THE BOX as LEE stands and walks toward tw curved bars on the side of the SILO. He turns around... a begins to descend A LADDER. WE HOLD ON THE SMALL BOX... then just as LEE's head disappears... WE SLOWLY BEGIN TO RISE. Now looking at the opposite side of the ridge than we did the beginning, the rising moon's light now spills across vista of rock and trees and onto an enormous and bizarrel out of place.... CRATER! WE HOLD ON THE CRATER FOR A LONG MOMENT... Then:

WE ARE CLOSE on a small mound of dirt. Suddenly two hands covered in winter gloves enter frame and begin to dig dow about 3 inches to reveal... a plank of wood. WIDER NOW, we see EVELYN on her hands and knees just behi the living room set up in an open, very make-shift kitche One wall of shelves cluttered with stacks of paper plates bowls and cups. Beneath it... red hot rocks let off a combination of steam and sm EVELYN brings the box to the counter top and carefully li the lid to reveal... a perfectly cooked fish with lemon a rosemary and garlic scattered all around.

WE TRACK with REGAN as she walks down the row of horse st bedrooms. REGAN arrives at the threshold of LEE and EVELYN's bedroo LEE is faced away from her, washing his face in a long tr like sink that runs the length of the room. Suddenly, through the mirror leaning on the wall, LEE sees her... B does not turn.

Through the mirror, the two of them looking silently at e other for a moment too long... it is heartbreaking. REGAN pathetically gestures "eating". As LEE nods, trying muster a polite smile we can see very clearly... somethin broken. LEE wipes his face with a towel and then turns to face... empty doorway.

The family sits down together for dinner... around an old workbench. Their heads bowed in prayer, after a moment EVELYN lifts her head and they begin to eat. There are no plates. The food sits on various children's plastic placemats. There are no utensils... The family uses only bread to collect food. We slowly pull back on this silent but comfortingly familiar scene.

REGAN and MARCUS lie on the floor playing... Monopoly. By the dim light of an oil lantern... we can see the game board is the same, but the pieces are small colored bobbl of wool, the kind you would find on a children's Christma sweater. The houses and hotels are empty sugar packets, b and pink. And the money?... Small pieces of green, red, b and orange fabric rectangles... all equally sized. MARCUS is five spaces away from his sister's hotel on Boardwalk. He takes a sip of water and places the cup on of a tall crate being used as a makeshift side table. MAR looks at his sister, who can't hide her smile. He mimes a prayer before rolling the dice on the dirt floor, where i makes no noise............... 5! MARCUS slowly looks up to REGAN, knowing his fate. REGAN smiles pointedly and then reaches for MARCUS' money. As MARCUS thrusts his arm back to protect his bank, his elbo hits the oil lantern!! A BOOMING CRASH!!!! As the oil lantern hits the ground an shatters. THE SOUND FEELS HUGE!.. AS IT IS THE FIRST BIG SOUND WE'VE HEARD! FIRE ERUPTS ON THE FLOOR!!! The childr stare frozen in horror! LEE immediately jumps up from the table and instinctively grabs a quilt and throws it on the fire. With a few silen pats... the fire is gone.
REGAN shoots MARCUS a look... of concern. MARCUS shoots L look... of terror. LEE shoots a look... to the roof.

ON LEE as he stands up INTO frame. He has almost physical transformed from a man... into protection incarnate. He slowly raises a stiff finger to his lips, his body so tense... it looks painful. This is the unwanted version o himself that lies just millimeters under his skin... 24 h a day. After a long moment... nothing... It would have happened now... LEE finally nods that everything is OK. MARCUS stares at REGAN with a painfully apologetic face as she leans in an touches his hand.

The whole family startles in silence!!! ... Something has hit the roof. EVERYONE IS FROZEN... LOOKING AT THE CEILING. Seconds later a high pitched SHRIEEEEEEK of CLAWS sliding down the aluminum roof. The family follows the sound exac with their eyes. Then silence. LEE crouches down and walks to a small window where the s stopped above. MARCUS wildly shakes his head "no", eviden of his traumatic anxiety resurfacing. REGAN slowly stands looking on with wide eyes. LEE arrives at the window, crouched. From his low vantage point we can see the lip of the gutter... and the eerily swaying Christmas lights. LEE begins to stand up slowly, his face now virtually pre against the glass. Suddenly, A WHIR OF SCREECHING AND GROWLING!!! A LARGE SH
... As two raccoons hit the ground, fighting... then scam off into the dark. LEE somehow exhales slowly and calmly... a trick that, no doubt, took much practice... and walks away from the wind

It is night. From high above, we look down to the sand pa between the RED BARN and the WHITE FARMHOUSE. In the foreground we see the shadow of a telephone pole. Sitting the wire in silhouette... are BIRDS.

Suddenly... A GIANT FOOT STEPS INTO FRAME!!!! ... AND THEN ANOTHER... as we watch two bare feet... then hem of a dress... and then the silhouette of... EVELYN wa silently toward the house.

WE SLOWLY PULL BACK from THAT SAME SHOT of the FARMHOUSE reveal... a plastic frame... A red light... buttons. We realize this image is being viewed... on a small monitor. CCTV FOOTAGE... from A SECURITY CAMERA. WE CONTINUE TO PULL BACK SLOWLY as ... Another monitor co into frame... with another stacked on top of it... then o next to it... and another... until we reveal, like someth out of a Dr. Seuss book, a wall of 20 TV's, all shapes an brands sit on top of a large workbench covered with open notebooks and sliced up newspapers.
